                  Columbia Pictures(2007). Length : 139min                    


 Peter Parker has finally managed to piece together the once-broken parts of  
 his life, maintaining a balance between his relationship with Mary-Jane and  
 his responsibility as Spider-Man. But more challenges arise for our young    
 hero. Peter&#039;s old friend Harry Obsourne has set out for revenge against      
 Peter; taking up the mantle of his late father&#039;s persona as The New Goblin,  
 and Peter must also capture Uncle Ben&#039;s real killer, Flint Marko, who has    
 been transformed into his toughest foe yet, the Sandman. All hope seems      
 lost when suddenly Peter&#039;s suit turns jet-black and greatly amplifies his    
 powers. But it also begins to greatly amplify the much darker qualities of   
 Peter&#039;s personality that he begins to lose himself to. Peter has to reach    
 deep inside himself to free the compassionate hero he used to be if he is    
 to ever conquer the darkness within and face not only his greatest enemies,  
 but also...himself.                                                          
                                                                              

--------==========----------
Happy Hacker Industries 

Is an Audio/Video ripping group founded several years ago
by a few individuals who do nothing but deal with computers
on a yearly 24/7 schedule; and sometimes when sleeping. 

We release things as we find the time to do so, we do not 
release items necessarily as they come out in the stores.
We take pride in our releases and do monitor various outlets
where our work can be acquired.
